values:
This Is An OOC Note to all....

Is Harry coming back as Gryffindor seeker or is it still going to Be Ginny?
And if Harry does come back would Ginny consider being a chaser? 

I was going to have Katie hold Quidditch Team Tryouts as soon as school started. 

These are the positions that need to be filled...
2 chasers
2 beaters (I can't remember who replaced the Weasley's, but it said that they weren't very good, So I figured they can be replaced as well. That leaves more spots open for anyone who wants to have their character join the team)

leave a comment and let me know what you think....
